channel.title: Reputation
channel.description:
Basically I wanted to see what all you guys think, so be open minded and express yourself freely !
I made this poll based on " ++Rep " because it is useless
But maybe we could put in back into use, with simple thing called " change "
the community should just get together and make some good idea's on how people could get" ++Rep " without doing cheesy things ..
I think this would also benefit others player that are helpful on moparscape because they will be the ones with majority of the high reputation so players could turn to the more civilized members and get some info.
I understand some people may think this is a stupid idea ; but please do not flame this forum about how dumb this idea is ' [b]just vote[/b].

item.title: Reputation
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:64, topic:320136”]You guys act like it’s life and death.

It’s simple, if you see rep abuse get on IRC and report it to staff.
Nothing is gonna change, so quit whining.[/quote]

i cant because i get kicked from it whenever i join

Read full topic

item.title: Reputation
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:62, topic:320136”][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=416591.msg3065288#msg3065288 date=1261179699]

What about moderated rep? Where if i give somebody rep, a person of authority is to allow it before it is actually given. Then rep will only be earned for valid reasons.

Has been discussed before, but the amount of rep passed around MoparScape daily would be too much to moderate.

Maybe we could have a selected amount of members that could moderate the rep overflow.
[/quote]

Mmm, tbh, I disagreed, I mean, I’m active roughly 15 hours a day, I’m constantly checking on here for new shizz.
And that’s just me, I know there’s loads of other active guys.[/quote]

It would have to be decided on high ranking mods and Admins. (Of course it’s only a theory)

Read full topic

item.title: Reputation
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:59, topic:320136”]Same thing as leeching in this community. it’s never gonna go away. Rep abuse will always be here. But why the fuck does rep even matter enough to make a topic about it? Ignore it. It seems people base their whole fucking life on getting 200 rep. Newsflash: these are forums on the internet that don’t fucking matter at all.

Though, I believe the rep system should be a power, such as banning or muting. Repping should be reset for all and only be available to Moderators+ if it’s that big of deal to everyone that we have to constantly be talking about it.[/quote]

i devoted my life to getting 200 rep

Read full topic

item.title: Reputation
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Same thing as leeching in this community. it’s never gonna go away. Rep abuse will always be here. But why the fuck does rep even matter enough to make a topic about it? Ignore it. It seems people base their whole fucking life on getting 200 rep. Newsflash: these are forums on the internet that don’t fucking matter at all.

Though, I believe the rep system should be a power, such as banning or muting. Repping should be reset for all and only be available to Moderators+ if it’s that big of deal to everyone that we have to constantly be talking about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Reputation
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:54, topic:320136”][quote author=Primadude link=topic=416591.msg3064759#msg3064759 date=1261143148]

I would like to see a rep-- button however

Though I’m sure that would get abused too

How about only enable veterans and staff members to be able to rep–?
[/quote]

Admins already can. [/quote]

I am aware of that :P, but if the veterans and lower-rank staff members were given the power to rep–, it means it wouldn’t be abused. If it was abused by the vets/staff members, however, the person who did it could be warned, demoted or whatever punishment is sufficient.

Read full topic
